title: Sacapuntas
descript: This word means pencil sharpener. An example of the use of this word is: '¿Me prestas tu sacapuntas?' = 'Can I borrow your pencil sharpener?'

title: Estrofa
descript: It means stanza. Each of the parts composed of the same number of verses and arranged in the same way as some poetic compositions consist of.

title: Párrafo
descript: It means paragraph. Fragment of a prose text made up of a set of consecutive lines and characterized by the full stop at the end of the last one.

title: Escrito
descript: It means written. Express an idea or thought in writing in a coherent way and without spelling mistakes

title: Regla
descript: It means rule. An example of the use of this word is: 'Usa la regla para no equivocarte' = 'Use the rule to avoid mistakes'

title: Profesor
descript: It means teacher. An example of the use of this word is: 'Mi profesor es buena persona' = 'My teacher is a good person'
